newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt offers 182-day bills worth 900 million pound.
newsitem.headline: Egypt offers 182-day bills worth 900 million pound.

text.p: The Egyptian treasury offered 182-day treasury bills worth 900 million pounds for auction on December 16 and issue on December 17, when 182-day bills worth 948.900 million pounds mature.
The average yield at the last auction was 10.121 percent.
